create_first_habit: Create your first habit to get started
complete_habits_to_see: Complete habits to see them here
delete_habit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete_habit_confirmation_generic: Are you sure you want to delete this habit? This action cannot be undone.
complete_habit_to_see_calendar: Complete this habit to see it appear in the calendar
marked_all_today_completed: All habits marked as completed for today
marked_all_today_incomplete: All habits marked as incomplete for today
marked_all_yesterday_completed: All habits marked as completed for yesterday
marked_all_yesterday_incomplete: All habits marked as incomplete for yesterday
set_weekly_target: Set how many days per week you want to complete this habit
set_monthly_target: Set how many days per month you want to complete this habit
weekly_goal_invalid: Weekly goal must be between 0 and 7
monthly_goal_invalid: Monthly goal must be between 0 and 31
delete_tag_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
create_first_tag: Create your first tag to get started
please_define_occurrences: Please define occurrences in habit settings first
show_streak_borders_description: Display colored borders on habit cards and timeline squares for active streaks
timeline_compact_mode_description: Use a more compact timeline view in habit cards
show_week_month_highlights_description: Highlight current week and month in timeline
show_streak_numbers_description: Display streak numbers on timeline squares
compact_cards_description: Use a more compact card layout
bad_habit_logic_mode_description: Choose how bad habits affect your timeline completion
show_statistics_card_description: Display the statistics card on the timeline page
show_main_timeline_description: Display the calendar grid on the timeline page
use_streak_colors_for_squares_descriptio: Color completed day squares based on streak length and color scheme
show_streak_on_card_description: Display streak number on habit cards
habit_card_layout_mode_classic: Classic layout (content + button on the side)
habit_card_layout_mode_top_row: Top-row layout (content left, button right, timeline below)
habit_card_timeline_fill_lines_descripti: Instead of a fixed day count, fill a set number of full lines with day squares
main_timeline_fill_lines_description: Instead of a fixed day count, fill a set number of full lines on the main timeline
export_all_data_description: Export habits, entries, streaks, and tracking data
export_habits_description: Export only habit definitions (no tracking data)
export_settings_description: Export all app settings and preferences
import_data_description: Import habits, settings, or all data from a file
import_all_data_description: Import habits, entries, streaks, and tracking data
import_all_data_description_with_format: Import habits, entries, streaks, and tracking data (JSON or CSV files)
import_habits_description_with_format: Import only habit definitions (JSON files only)
import_settings_description_with_format: Import app settings and preferences (JSON files only)
import_all_data_file_picker: Select JSON or CSV file to import all data
import_habits_file_picker: Select JSON file to import habits
import_settings_file_picker: Select JSON file to import settings
use_settings_import: Please use Settings import for settings files
view_database_stats: View counts of habits, entries, and streaks
reset_all_habits_description: Delete all habits, entries, and streaks
reset_all_habits_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all habits? This will also delete all tracking entries and streaks. This action cannot be undone.
reset_all_settings_description: Restore all settings to default values
reset_all_settings_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This action cannot be undone.
clear_all_data_description: Delete all habits, entries, streaks, and reset all settings
clear_all_data_confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear ALL data? This will delete all habits, entries, streaks, tags, and reset all settings. This action cannot be undone.
optimize_database_description: Vacuum database to reclaim space and optimize performance
optimize_database_confirmation: This will optimize the database by reclaiming unused space. This may take a few moments.
habits_reset_success: All habits have been reset successfully
settings_reset_success: All settings have been reset to defaults
all_data_cleared_success: All data has been cleared successfully
open_source_libraries_description: View packages and dependencies used in this app
license_description: View the license and terms of use
usage_rights_description: Terms and conditions for using this app
privacy_policy_description: How we handle your data and privacy
license_description_full: This app is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
license_share: Share — copy and redistribute the material
license_adapt: Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material
license_attribution: Attribution — You must give appropriate credit
license_noncommercial: NonCommercial — You may not use the material for commercial purposes
license_sharealike: ShareAlike — If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license
usage_agreement: By using this app, you agree to the following terms:
usage_license_text: This app is provided under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
usage_personal: You may use this app for personal, non-commercial purposes
usage_modify: You may modify and share the app under the same license
usage_attribution: You must provide attribution to the original creator
usage_no_commercial: No commercial use without explicit permission
usage_no_warranty: No warranty or guarantee of any kind
privacy_data_storage_text: All your habit data, tracking entries, and settings are stored locally on your device. We do not collect, transmit, or store any of your personal data on external servers.
privacy_data_collection_text: This app does not collect any personal information. All data remains on your device and is never shared with third parties.
privacy_notifications: Notifications: Used only to send habit reminders you configure
privacy_file_access: File Access: Used only for importing/exporting your data
privacy_network: Network: Only used when you explicitly choose to send logs to GitHub for bug reporting. The app works completely offline otherwise.
privacy_your_rights_text: You have full control over your data. You can export, import, or delete all your data at any time through the app settings.
app_description: A habit tracker app with timeline visualization.
onboarding_welcome_description: Track your habits with beautiful timeline visualization. Build consistency and achieve your goals one day at a time.
onboarding_timeline_description: See your progress at a glance with our intuitive calendar grid. Each day shows your completion status across all habits.
onboarding_tracking_description: Track habits as completed tasks, measurable goals, or multiple occurrences per day. Choose what works best for you.
onboarding_get_started_description: Try demo data to explore the app, import your existing data, or start fresh with a new habit.
no_habits_message: Create your first habit to start tracking your progress, or try demo data to see how the app works.
delete_demo_data_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all demo data? This action cannot be undone.
demo_data_loaded: Demo data has been loaded successfully
return_to_onboarding_confirmation: This will take you back to the onboarding screen. You can explore the app features and choose to try demo data, import data, or start fresh.
could_not_open_link: Could not open link. Please visit: {url}
clear_logs_confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all logs? This action cannot be undone.
github_issue_title_hint: Enter a title for the GitHub issue
github_issue_description_hint: Describe the issue or what you were doing when it occurred
failed_to_send_logs: Failed to send logs to GitHub
